member.name: T:Volo.Abp.Authorization.Permissions.AlwaysAllowPermissionChecker
member.summary:
Always allows for any permission.
Use IServiceCollection.AddAlwaysAllowAuthorization() to replace IPermissionChecker with this class. This is useful for tests.

member.name: M:Volo.Abp.Authorization.Permissions.IPermissionDefinitionContext.GetGroup(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a pre-defined permission group. Throws if can not find the given group.

member.name: M:Volo.Abp.Authorization.Permissions.IPermissionDefinitionContext.GetGroupOrNull(System.String)
member.summary: Tries to get a pre-defined permission group. Returns null if can not find the given group.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Authorization.Permissions.PermissionDefinition.Parent
member.summary: Parent of this permission if one exists. If set, this permission can be granted only if parent is granted.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Authorization.Permissions.PermissionDefinition.Providers
member.summary: A list of allowed providers to get/set value of this permission. An empty list indicates that all providers are allowed.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Authorization.Permissions.PermissionDefinition.Properties
member.summary: Can be used to get/set custom properties for this permission definition.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Authorization.Permissions.PermissionDefinition.IsEnabled
member.summary:
Indicates whether this permission is enabled or disabled. A permission is normally enabled. A disabled permission can not be granted to anyone, but it is still will be available to check its value (while it will always be false).
Disabling a permission would be helpful to hide a related application functionality from users/clients.
Default: true.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Authorization.Permissions.PermissionDefinition.Item(System.String)
member.returns: Returns the value in the dictionary by given . Returns null if given is not present in the dictionary.

member.name: M:Volo.Abp.Authorization.Permissions.PermissionDefinition.WithProperty(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets a property in the dictionary. This is a shortcut for nested calls on this object.

member.name: M:Volo.Abp.Authorization.Permissions.PermissionDefinition.WithProviders(System.String[])
member.summary: Set the property. This is a shortcut for nested calls on this object.

member.name: M:Volo.Abp.Authorization.Permissions.PermissionDefinitionContextExtensions.TryDisablePermission(Volo.Abp.Authorization.Permissions.IPermissionDefinitionContext,System.String)
member.summary: Finds and disables a permission with the given . Returns false if given permission was not found.
member.returns: Returns true if given permission was found. Returns false if given permission was not found.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Authorization.Permissions.PermissionGroupDefinition.Item(System.String)
member.returns: Returns the value in the dictionary by given . Returns null if given is not present in the dictionary.
